src:
台南學弟妹想看「在韓國的學姐」　周子瑜驚喜現身嗨爆了
06 Nov 2019, 05:15 by 吳妍
台南市復興國中明（7）日將迎接45週年校慶，明星校友周子瑜特別拍攝影片捎來祝福，影片公開後網友紛紛羨慕起復興國中的學生，更大讚子瑜說中文「好溫柔好好聽」！



影片中老師大跳TWICE招牌歌曲〈TT〉，但子瑜的學弟妹們卻不滿意，向老師要求「想要看在韓國的學姐啦」，結果下一秒校長敬世龍出現，直呼「想要看韓國的學姐嗎！校長變給你！」
接著背景音樂響起TWICE新歌〈Feel Special〉，周子瑜穿著亮片洋裝出現，替母校45週年校慶獻上祝福，最後還握緊雙拳，替學弟妹們加油。
影片才上傳兩天，已有將近3萬人點閱，網友也紛紛留言「子瑜說中文真好聽」「哇，這是世巡日本場期間錄的耶！！羨慕啊啊～」「剛畢業的表示崩潰」「子瑜人美心善，恭喜你們有這樣好的學姐」。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 05:13
text:
Tainan’s younger brother and sister want to see “Sister in South Korea” Zhou Ziyu’s surprise surprise
06 Nov 2019, 05:15 by Wu Hao
Tainan City, the rejuvenating country Zhongming (7) will greet the 45th anniversary of the celebration, star alumnus Zhou Ziyu specially filmed the film to bless, after the film is open, netizens have envied the students who have revived the middle school, and even more praised the child to speak Chinese "good gentle and good to listen "!"



In the film, the teacher jumped TWICE's signature song <TT>, but Ziyu's younger brothers and sisters were dissatisfied. They asked the teacher to "want to see the school sister in Korea". As a result, the next second president, Jing Shilong, appeared. Want to see a Korean school sister! The principal will change to you!"
Then the background music sounded TWICE new song "Feel Special", Zhou Ziyu appeared in a sequin dress, blessed the 45th anniversary of the alma mater, and finally clenched the boxing, cheering for the younger brothers and sisters.
The film was uploaded for two days, and nearly 30,000 people have read it. The netizens also commented that "Zi Yu said that Chinese is really good." "Wow, this is the record recorded during the World Tour Japan!! Envy ah~" "Just graduated The expression of the collapse "" Zi Yu people are good-hearted, congratulations to you have such a good school sister."
Update time|2019.11.06 05:13
